job.title: Data Scientist - Operations Research
job.industry: Environmental Services,Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: Mackin is looking for an Operations Research Scientist to work within a larger Analytics & Technology-focused group to deliver innovative insights and solutions for our partners. The ideal candidate has a scientific mindset; has expertise in operations research methods and models; applies a pragmatic approach to building solutions; and enjoys collaborating within a dynamic, global team.
